manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MK-908A MERKUR Detailing razor blades designed for moustache and beard care. Each individual package is sealed and contains 10 blades. Each blade is individually wax-paper wrapped. Works with MERKUR Detailing Razor. MK-911 MERKUR Stainless-Steel Super-Platinum double-edge razor blades. Each individual package is sealed and contains 10 blades. Each blade is individually wax-paper wrapped. Works with MERKUR and standard double-edge safety razors. MK-911-3PK 3 packs of stainless steel double-edge MERKUR razor blades which can be used with a wide variety of safety razors. Manufactured in Czech Republic. Total of 30 blades included.

About the Brand MERKUR Stahlwaren GmbH & Co. is a leading worldwide manufacturer of quality classic shaving equipment since 1896. MERKUR offers the right razor for every beard and face type, thus ensuring the best conditions for an effective wet shave. MERKUR razors are produced in Solingen following German high technological and environmental standards. MK-911 MERKUR Double Edge Razor Blades MERKUR Stainless-Steel Super-Platinum double-edge razor blades. Each individual package is sealed and contains 10 blades. Each blade is individually wax-paper wrapped. Works with MERKUR and standard double-edge safety razors. MERKUR Detailing razor blades designed for moustache and beard care MERKUR Detailing razor blades designed for moustache and beard care Each blade is individually wax-paper wrapped. Works with MERKUR Detailing Razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality compared to cheaper options
reviews.reviewText: Much cleaner, smoother shave. I bought some other Easter European brand ones and they are garbage compared to these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Merkur Platinum Razor Blades. Great smooth shaves. Excellent longevity.
reviews.reviewText: After using razor blades from different countries, the Merkur Platinum razor blades are my favorite blades. The Merkur blades provide close, smooth shaves and have excellent durability. Make sure to get the Merkur razor blades made in Germany. The German blades come in a small white plastic carton. There are Merkur razor blades made in the Czech Republic that come in small paper carton that are inferior to the German razor blades. German-made Merkur blades are available from razorbladesclub.com. Feather blades from Japan are very sharp but can be tough on your skin, and they are not as durable. Merkur Platinum razor blades provide a good balance between sharpness and smoothness and have good longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shaving blades out there!
reviews.reviewText: These blades work the best in my new shaver and are long lasting! The delivery is always on time right to my front door!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Edited Review - a little overpriced
reviews.reviewText: My original review is below, and as someone who reads and appreciates feedback, I needed to send in an updated review. I've totally changed my opinion of these blades, and think they are GREAT! I think the first blade I used must have been a bad one because since trying another blade, these have been my "go to." These are sharp and I get a super close shave with these, but not too close. (Feathers are too close for me). These deserved another try in my shave routine and have now become part of the regular rotation.Original review below:My first shave with this razor, and it felt very harsh. I have sensitive skin and this left me feeling raw. I always give a blade multiple shaves to see if it gets better, but usually know on the first pass if I like it or not. I've tried a lot of razors and I think there are better values out there for the price. The blade is very sharp (IMO not as sharp as a feather, which is not my go to), but left my skin irritated. I haven't cut myself in a while, but had a couple of nicks with this blade. Not a very forgiving blade. I use a Gillette 1962 Slim adjustable. First shave was on a #4 setting and will try to dial it back and see if it gets better. Every DE shaver has an opinion on what works well for them. IMO it wasn't an aggressive shave, but was a harsh blade on my skin. Just two passes today, WTG and XTG...2 hours later and still feeling a burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Merkur: Czech blades designed in Germany
reviews.reviewText: Merkur (made in Czech Republic) good blades but maybe will last 3 shaves as they seem dull after that. the blades are better than Wilkinson sword classics though(made in Germany) . Merkur blades are expensive; my only real con.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No longer the reputed quality - read to get a better brand
reviews.reviewText: I bought a few blade brands when entering the safety razor market. I purchased these expecting them to be out-classing everything else, based on several shaving blogs. I’ll cut to the chase and tell you not to waste your money on these. The Personna blades that I purchased were far away the best blades and dramatically better than these. And Personna is made in USA, whereas these are made in Czech Republic and many other brands, communist China. And the Personna are cheaper. The quality of the shave comparing these is off the charts — Merkur blades feel dull from the first shave and I’ve thrown out the remaining I purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this brand for years because of the value and great performance. But now it looks like they are no longer made in Germany and I can only get 1 shave out of them before they are useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for a long time and is very sharp.
reviews.reviewText: Good for cutting long hairs without cutting yourself.
Sí, son caras, lo sé pero son las mejores cuchillas que he probado, ni irritación ni un sólo punto rojo. Increíbles.

Muy buena calidad. Y no necesitas ser un experto para evitar cortarte. Super fácil y eficiente. Llevo 5 rasuradas y sigue funcionando. El tiempo dirá la eficiencia de cada hoja pero vale la pena el gasto hasta hoy

Mai provato lame migliori di queste. Ho provato e riprovato modelli alternativi, ma come queste nessuna.Durano almeno un mese e soltanto dopo questo periodo presentano qualche punto di ruggine. La rasatura che lasciano è perfetta.Le consiglio vivamente!
